tx xRG, although I dont know well on avs script, Some how managed did one. Final output z great.
But the prob z, it took more than 2h ( close to 3h) to full encoding process. Which I used earlier took less than 1h to same source, bt give small quality loss, due to overrate of AC3 audio.
For 2h 36min movie, target 1400mb
earlier - video bitrate - 864kb
audio - 384kb
when use MeGUI
video - 1052 kb
audio -192 kb
So, had little difference @ video when watch. 

By the way, AC3 @ 192kb has good quality, below that may worse.

Ripping time depends on What Script u use
if u use normal script it will take 2-3 hrs
in my script it takes about 6-8 hrs
